articles.title: Sovereign gold bonds open for subscription next week ahead of Dhanteras - Mint
articles.description: Gold bonds have a maturity period of eight years with an exit option after fifth year.The redemption price is based on the then prevailing price of gold.
articles.content: The eighth tranche of sovereign gold bonds of this fiscal will open for subscription on Monday and will close on November 13. The issue price for Sovereign Gold Bond Scheme 2020-21-Series VIII has be… [+1990 chars]

articles.title: Supreme Court stays Delhi High Court order SpiceJet Rs. 243 crores in Kalanithi Maran - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
articles.description: In September the Delhi HC had asked the airline company to make the deposit of the 243 crores within six weeks.
